item.title: German Producers Upbeat Following Revamp of Funding but There’s Still Room for Improvement
item.description: Germany’s filmmaking scene is vibrant, with a recent reform of the country’s film law boosting production incentives, but producers see room for improvement. The Teutonic contingent in Venice is led b
